page.title: 06Money.
page.content: {Batt's Shop.} It is very important to have a shop in Leintwardine. They usually spend Â£1000-Â£1800 per week. February and March are their busiest months. Leintwardine people tend to go to either Ludlow or Leominster at the weekend to shop.{ {Bank.}In the village of Leintwardine there is one Midland Bank.It is a small Bank with only two staff.It is only open on Monday and Friday from 10a.m till 2p.m. The staff thought it was important to have a Bank in Leintwardine because all ages banked there and very few people went to another town to Bank. {Post Office.}It does not only sell stamps but it sells sweets, a few toys, seeds, cards and you can hire videos. Their weekly takings vary greatly.
